item.description:
Not sure if any tickets are left for this event.

Every Native should do this at least once!

Doors open at 4 pm.

Bout #1 at 5 pm Boston Massacre vs Philadelphia

Intermission

Bout #2 at 7 pm Cosmonaughts vs Nutcrackers

After Party in the Fez Room with DJ John Barera

You will get to meet the Dames

Food Concessions are affordable

Tickets $14.00 in advance or $16.00 at the door if available (usually sold out)

For more information go to www.bostonderbydames.com

If you want to go buy your ticket on line in advance. These events almost always sell out. This one will since it is School Vacation week.

Arrive early to pick up your will call ticket and meet us. Seating is general admission. We will send you an E Mail 2 days before the event with instructions where to meet.
item.how_to_find_us: We will E Mail those who have purchased tickets.
item.name: Boston Derby Dames RollerDerby Doubleheader featuring The Boston Massacre
